title: Population factors as quality of life indicators

content.prompt: Which of the following pairs of statistics would most likely indicate the highest quality of life in a country?

choices.label: High rate of teenage pregnancy and low gross domestic product
High life expectancy and low infant mortality
High crude birth rate and low literacy rate
High level of export and low social status of women
High emigration rate and low total fertility rate

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
